title: You can win a Nova 9 smartphone with the Huawei Carnival
author: sponsored
article: To celebrate its digital Carnival, Huawei is giving you the chance to win a fantastic prize.

Download the My Huawei app, experience what the Huawei Carnival has to offer and then let Huawei know how it can make the offering even better in the form below to be in with a chance of winning a brand new smartphone.
Up for grabs are a Huawei Nova 9 and Huawei Nova 8 smartphone, and its easy to enter - just following the instructions below.

headers.3: How to enter the Huawei Carnival prize draw
